Detailed Description

Class PatchCellDataOpsInteger provides a collection of operations that may be used to manipulate integer cell-centered patch data. The operations include basic arithmetic, min, max, etc. With the assertion of a few basic routines, this class inherits its interface (and thus its functionality) from the base class PatchCellDataBasicOps from which it is derived.

A more extensive set of operations is implemented for real (double and float) and complex patch data in the classes PatchCellDataOpsReal and PatchCellDataOpsComplex, respectively.

See also:
math::PatchCellDataBasicOps

void SAMRAI::math::PatchCellDataOpsInteger::swapData ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::Patch > &  patch,
const int  data1_id,
const int  data2_id 
) const

Swap pointers for patch data objects. Objects are checked for consistency of depth, box, and ghost box.

Precondition:
patch->getPatchData(data1_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::CellData<int> >

patch->getPatchData(data2_id) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::CellData<int> >

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getDepth() == patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getDepth()

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getBox())

patch->getPatchData(data1_id)->getGhostBox().isSpatiallyEqual(patch->getPatchData(data2_id)->getGhostBox())
